mapper.insert:
select resume_seq.nextval from dual
insert into resume(resume_no,user_no,location1,location2,jobtype1,jobtype2, sal,self_int_title,self_int,regdate) values(#{resumeNo},#{userNo},#{location1},#{location1}, #{jobtype1},#{jobtype2},#{sal},#{selfIntTitle},#{selfInt},sysdate)

select EDUCATION_seq.nextval from dual
insert into education(edu_code,final_edu,uni,uni_name,edu_location, edu_period,major,edu_score,resume_no) values(#{eduCode},#{finalEdu},#{uni},#{uniName},#{eduLocation}, #{eduPeriod},#{major},#{eduScore},#{resumeNo})

select career_seq.nextval from dual
insert into career(career_code,career_company,career_period,career_reason, task,resume_no,career_rank,career_year,career_location,career_sal) values(#{careerCode},#{careerCompany},#{careerPeriod},#{careerReason},#{task}, #{resumeNo},#{careerRank},#{careerYear},#{careerLocation},#{careerSal})

select LANGUAGE_seq.nextval from dual
insert into LANGUAGE(lang_code,kinds,test_name,lang_score,rating,lang_get_date,resume_no) values(#{langCode},#{kinds},#{testName},#{langScore},#{rating},#{langGetDate},#{resumeNo})

select addinfo_seq.nextval from dual
insert into addinfo(info_code,disable,military,affair,s_fund,resume_no) values(#{infoCode},#{disable},#{military},#{affair},#{sFund},#{resumeNo})

select active_seq.nextval from dual
insert into active(act_code,activity,act_place,act_period,act_content,resume_no) values(#{actCode},#{activity},#{actPlace},#{actPeriod},#{actContent},#{resumeNo})

select award_seq.nextval from dual
insert into award(award_code,award_name,award_com,award_get_date,resume_no) values(#{awardCode},#{awardName},#{awardCom},#{awardGetDate},#{resumeNo})

select potfolio_seq.nextval from dual
insert into potfolio(pot_code,pot_file,pot_period,pot_tools,workers,intro,resume_no) values(#{potCode},#{potFile},#{potPeriod},#{potTools},#{workers},#{intro},#{resumeNo})

select Certify_seq.nextval from dual
insert into certify(certify_code,certify_name,certify_place,certify_get_date,resume_no) values(#{certifyCode},#{certifyName},#{certifyPlace},#{certifyGetDate},#{resumeNo})
mapper.select: select * from resume where resume_no=#{resumeNo} order by regdate desc
